SEO issues

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    3 links found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • section.bg-darkerblue > ul > li > img
      <img data-nuxt-img="" srcset="/_ipx/_/assets/images/home/email.svg 1x, /_ipx/_/assets/images/home/email.…" onerror="this.setAttribute('data-error', 1)" rounded-8="" h-80="" object-contain="" md:mx-au…
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
    • section.bg-darkerblue > ul > li > img
      <img data-nuxt-img="" srcset="/_ipx/_/assets/images/home/card.svg 1x, /_ipx/_/assets/images/home/card.sv…" onerror="this.setAttribute('data-error', 1)" rounded-8="" h-80="" object-contain="" md:mx-au…
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
    • section.bg-darkerblue > ul > li > img
      <img data-nuxt-img="" srcset="/_ipx/_/assets/images/home/stats.svg 1x, /_ipx/_/assets/images/home/stats.…" onerror="this.setAttribute('data-error', 1)" rounded-8="" h-80="" object-contain="" md:mx-au…
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 230 ms
    Est savings of 230 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 160 ms
    Est savings of 330 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 148 ms
    Est savings of 150 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 120 ms
    Est savings of 104 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Enable text compression
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 79 KiB
    Text-based resources should be served with compression (gzip, deflate or brotli) to minimize total network bytes. [Learn more about text compression](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-text-compression/).

    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 104 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 65 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 71 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).

      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 7 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 450 ms
    Est savings of 450 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 190 ms
    Est savings of 339 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 147 ms
    Est savings of 150 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 90 ms
    Est savings of 108 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 90 ms
    Est savings of 104 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

  • Page is blocked from indexing0

    • section.bg-neutral-100 > div > div > img
      <img data-nuxt-img="" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/9a318235-c463-4504-b00e-bac54dc5d3b9_Crypt…" onerror="this.setAttribute('data-error', 1)" src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/9a318235-c…
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
    • li > div.nq-prose > p.block-img > img
      <img src="https://prismic-io.s3.amazonaws.com/nimiq/91319641-44e4-40c1-8471-7051cc07…" srcset="https://prismic-io.s3.amazonaws.com/nimiq/91319641-44e4-40c1-8471-7051cc07…">

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 436 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 170 ms
    Est savings of 337 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 151 ms
    Est savings of 150 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 104 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 96 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).

    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)
    • div > nav > div > a.item
      <a aria-label="Previous Page" type="button" disabled="" class="item" data-v-1fe64830="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 7 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 430 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 170 ms
    Est savings of 340 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 148 ms
    Est savings of 150 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 104 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 104 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).

  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/f6960c8e-4ea4-431b-bcb9-7752e65d0369_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/f6960c8e-4ea4-431b-bcb9-7752e65d0369_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/cf20fc1b-76a8-4cad-8f28-e9d64d523b24_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/cf20fc1b-76a8-4cad-8f28-e9d64d523b24_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">

      Element does not have an alt attribute

      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/b5ed8512-0a04-46c9-8fd9-551753e7d970_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/b5ed8512-0a04-46c9-8fd9-551753e7d970_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 465 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 160 ms
    Est savings of 340 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 40 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 7 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 430 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 113 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 77 ms
    Est savings of 80 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/6bd52839-7c13-47f9-b7f2-5f5c06f331d3_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/6bd52839-7c13-47f9-b7f2-5f5c06f331d3_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">

      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…

    Potential savings: 540 ms
    Est savings of 776 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 467 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 200 ms
    Est savings of 247 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 73 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 466 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 440 ms
    Est savings of 534 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 230 ms
    Est savings of 294 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 84 ms
    Est savings of 80 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 102 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).

SEO issues

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    1 link found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 465 ms
    Est savings of 460 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 150 ms
    Est savings of 240 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 84 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).

[Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 467 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 174 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 54 ms
    Est savings of 50 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 124 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).

    Potential savings: 110 ms
    Est savings of 135 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 71 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 60 ms
    Est savings of 71 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 114 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).

  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 477 ms
    Est savings of 480 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 170 ms
    Est savings of 337 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 170 ms
    Est savings of 399 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).
  • Initial server response time was short
    Potential savings: 150 ms
    Root document took 250 ms
    Keep the server response time for the main document short because all other requests depend on it. [Learn more about the Time to First Byte metric](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/time-to-first-byte/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 63 ms
    Est savings of 60 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 465 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 50 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 40 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).

SEO issues

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    1 link found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • section.bg-neutral-100 > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/Zho2DDjCgu4jzzC2_Capturadeecra%CC%832024-0…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/Zho2DDjCgu4jzzC2_Capturadeecra%CC%832024-0…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 436 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 270 ms
    Est savings of 342 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 250 ms
    Est savings of 340 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 243 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

      <img src="https://prismic-io.s3.amazonaws.com/nimiq/a0893a1c-4366-4916-9ff3-218382ea…" srcset="https://prismic-io.s3.amazonaws.com/nimiq/a0893a1c-4366-4916-9ff3-218382ea…" class="medium-zoom-image">

      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 437 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 130 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 83 ms
    Est savings of 80 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 555 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).

    Est savings of 104 KiB

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 430 ms
    Est savings of 545 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 91 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).

    Est savings of 70 ms

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 430 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 120 ms
    Est savings of 189 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 66 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 69 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).

SEO issues

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    1 link found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).

    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB

    Potential savings: 70 ms

      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

Top opportunities

  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 560 ms
    Est savings of 1,204 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 470 ms
    Est savings of 640 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).
  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 436 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 69 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    2 links found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/7a9c876e-6ed6-4cf9-b073-9c2f14a26b0e_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/7a9c876e-6ed6-4cf9-b073-9c2f14a26b0e_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">

      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 128 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 100 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 69 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 7 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 465 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 48 ms
    Est savings of 50 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Initial server response time was short
    Potential savings: 27 ms
    Root document took 130 ms
    Keep the server response time for the main document short because all other requests depend on it. [Learn more about the Time to First Byte metric](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/time-to-first-byte/).

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 465 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 150 ms
    Est savings of 181 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 113 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 78 ms
    Est savings of 80 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 70 ms
    Est savings of 85 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).

    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image

SEO issues

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    1 link found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/35c4e937-6b66-4aec-9f43-a1406367fa69_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/35c4e937-6b66-4aec-9f43-a1406367fa69_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 467 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 177 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 80 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 85 KiB

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 430 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 250 ms
    Est savings of 460 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 250 ms
    Est savings of 478 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

Top opportunities

  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 620 ms
    Est savings of 785 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 580 ms
    Est savings of 745 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 430 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 436 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 20 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 39 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).

  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 435 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 245 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 70 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 50 ms
    Est savings of 60 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).

    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • section.bg-neutral-100 > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/464e84ac-27ad-4c94-8a98-11f7f6261e4c_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/464e84ac-27ad-4c94-8a98-11f7f6261e4c_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…

  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 60 ms
    Est savings of 153 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).

      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 7 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 437 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 130 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 108 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 71 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    1 link found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • section.bg-neutral-100 > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/313fbece-f49e-4d12-b70f-7d3d688c49a4_1.png…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/313fbece-f49e-4d12-b70f-7d3d688c49a4_1.png…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
    • section.bg-neutral-100 > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image

    Est savings of 151 KiB

  • Defer offscreen images
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 95 KiB
    Consider lazy-loading offscreen and hidden images after all critical resources have finished loading to lower time to interactive. [Learn how to defer offscreen images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/offscreen-images/).

    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 70 ms
    Est savings of 70 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 67 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).

  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/0d69fdec-1ef8-4d20-8e5b-3f2ee1a091b2_Websi…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/0d69fdec-1ef8-4d20-8e5b-3f2ee1a091b2_Websi…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…

    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).

      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

      Element has no title…

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 436 ms
    Est savings of 440 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 112 ms
    Est savings of 110 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 203 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Reduce unused CSS
    Potential savings: 40 ms
    Est savings of 56 KiB
    Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused CSS](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-css-rules/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 20 ms
    Est savings of 80 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).

    Potential savings: 80 ms

    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).

    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 107 KiB

    Est savings of 194 KiB

    Percentile: 4.000

SEO issues

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    1 link found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
    • div > ul > li > a
      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
  • Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes0
    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/4b3bc20b-2d76-4dc9-86a8-a81b5c6ab688_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/4b3bc20b-2d76-4dc9-86a8-a81b5c6ab688_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
  • Structured data is validn/a
    Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn more about Structured Data](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/structured-data/).

Passed checks: 6 · Not applicable: 1

Top opportunities

  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 620 ms
    Est savings of 753 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 467 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Serve images in next-gen formats
    Potential savings: 260 ms
    Est savings of 311 KiB
    Image formats like WebP and AVIF often provide better compression than PNG or JPEG, which means faster downloads and less data consumption. [Learn more about modern image formats](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-webp-images/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 100 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 53 ms
    Est savings of 50 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).

    Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/image-alt).
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image
      <img src="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/5c04a2fa-e83c-471b-9a46-cf44e667273f_blog_…" srcset="https://images.prismic.io/nimiq/5c04a2fa-e83c-471b-9a46-cf44e667273f_blog_…" class="medium-zoom-image">
      Fix any of the following:
      Element does not have an alt attribute
      aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
      aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
      Element has no title…
    • div > article > p.block-img > img.medium-zoom-image

Top opportunities

  • Avoid multiple page redirects
    Potential savings: 466 ms
    Est savings of 470 ms
    Redirects introduce additional delays before the page can be loaded. [Learn how to avoid page redirects](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/redirects/).
  • Properly size images
    Potential savings: 350 ms
    Est savings of 464 KiB
    Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time. [Learn how to size images](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/uses-responsive-images/).
  • Eliminate render-blocking resources
    Potential savings: 87 ms
    Est savings of 90 ms
    Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles. [Learn how to eliminate render-blocking resources](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/render-blocking-resources/).
  • Reduce unused JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 244 KiB
    Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unused-javascript/).
  • Minify JavaScript
    Potential savings: 80 ms
    Est savings of 77 KiB
    Minifying JavaScript files can reduce payload sizes and script parse time. [Learn how to minify JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/performance/unminified-javascript/).

SEO issues

  • Links do not have descriptive text0
    1 link found
    Descriptive link text helps search engines understand your content. [Learn how to make links more accessible](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/seo/link-text/).
  • Links are not crawlable0
    Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovered. [Learn how to make links crawlable](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/9112205)

      <a font-semibold="" un-text="f-sm neutral-800 hocus:neutral-900" transition-colors="" data-v-eb703c99="">
